mapper.select: select j.name as name, j.ID_DIRECTORY as directoryId, j.ID_TRANSFORMATION as transformationId, j.CREATED_USER as createUser, j.CREATED_DATE as createDate, j.MODIFIED_USER as modifiedUser, j.MODIFIED_DATE as modifiedDate from r_transformation j WHERE j.name=#{0}

select count(1) from r_transformation j WHERE j.use_batchid='Y'
AND j.`NAME` IN ( SELECT DISTINCT TASK_NAME FROM d_task_group_member_attribute t, d_task_group a WHERE t.TYPE='trans' AND t.TASK_GROUP_NAME = a.TASK_GROUP_NAME
AND a.ID_TASK_GROUP = #{4}
AND t.TASK_GROUP_NAME IN ( SELECT TASK_GROUP_NAME FROM d_user_group_tasks_relation WHERE USER_GROUP_NAME=#{2} ) )
and j.name LIKE concat('%',#{0},'%')
and date_format(j.CREATED_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{1}
and j.CREATED_USER in ( SELECT ID_USER FROM r_user where NAME LIKE concat('%',#{3},'%') )
mapper.update: UPDATE r_transformation SET NAME=#{1} WHERE NAME=#{0}
